FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key linking to the question table.

FIELD.NAME: responseformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of input area students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: responsefieldlines
FIELD.COMMENT: Approximate height, in lines, of the input box the students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: attachments
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether, and how many, attachments a student is allowed to include with their response. -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: maxbytes
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum number of bytes for file upload

FIELD.NAME: filetypes
FIELD.COMMENT: The allowed filetypes for file upload.

FIELD.NAME: comment
FIELD.COMMENT: Information shown to people with permission to manually grade the question, when they are grading.

FIELD.NAME: commentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The text format for comment.

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: The UUID of a task.

FIELD.NAME: responsetemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: The template to pre-populate student's response field during attempt.

FIELD.NAME: vcsuritemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: Template to generate URI for external submission (e.g. version control system).

FIELD.NAME: vcslabel
FIELD.COMMENT: Label for VCS input field.

FIELD.NAME: vcssystem
FIELD.COMMENT: 1=git, 2=SVN.

FIELD.NAME: taskrepository
FIELD.COMMENT: URI of repository.

FIELD.NAME: taskpath
FIELD.COMMENT: Location of task zip file in repository including filename.

FIELD.NAME: responsefilename
FIELD.COMMENT: Filename for user source code (if file upload is not used).

FIELD.NAME: programminglanguage
FIELD.COMMENT: Programming language

FIELD.NAME: taskfilename
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of task file if stored in Moodle.

FIELD.NAME: taskstorage
FIELD.COMMENT: task Location, 0=undefined, 1=internal, 2=external

FIELD.NAME: downloads
FIELD.COMMENT: List of names for downloadable files

FIELD.NAME: displayfiles
FIELD.COMMENT: List of names for display files

FIELD.NAME: templates
FIELD.COMMENT: List of further template filenames (to be be downloaded by student)

FIELD.NAME: modelsolfiles
FIELD.COMMENT: List of model solution files (to be be downloaded by student, for future use)

FIELD.NAME: aggregationstrategy
FIELD.COMMENT: aggregation strategy, 1=all or nothing, 2=weighted mean

FIELD.NAME: gradinghints
FIELD.COMMENT: editable grading hints

FIELD.NAME: proformaversion
FIELD.COMMENT: version of ProFormA task

FIELD.NAME: expandcollapse
FIELD.COMMENT: feedback option for collapsible regions.

FIELD.NAME: inlinemessages
FIELD.COMMENT: feedback option: shall messages be embedded into editor code?
